author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...EXTREMELY DANGEROUS HURRICANE MELISSA MAKES LANDFALL ON THE SOUTHERN COAST OF EASTERN CUBA...
summary: ...EXTREMELY DANGEROUS HURRICANE MELISSA MAKES LANDFALL ON THE SOUTHERN COAST OF EASTERN CUBA... As of 3:10 AM EDT Wed Oct 29 the center of Melissa was located near 20.0, -76.1 with movement NE at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 952 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
